detectors.description:
Token.onlyMinter() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFFAToken.sol#84-87) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool)(_minters[msg.sender] == true) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFFAToken.sol#85)
Pragma version^0.6.7 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFFAToken.sol#5) allows old versions
solc-0.6.12 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.6.12 is not recommended for deployment
